detail_desc: Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a shirt collar in woven fabric and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a shirt collar in woven fabric and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
A-line dress in thin, patterned sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a detachable braided imitation suede belt and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
A-line dress in thin, patterned sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a detachable braided imitation suede belt and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Body in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps with decorative straps front and back, and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket. Short sleeves and short legs, both with sewn-in turn-ups, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Blouse in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and cotton weave with a grandad collar, button placket and gathered yoke. Long sleeves with gathers at the shoulders, narrow, gathered cuffs with a button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Patterned travel pillow with a hanger at the top, press-stud fastening at the front and a removable cover. Size approx. 31x35 cm.
Soft glasses case with an opening on one short side. Size 8x17 cm.
Soft glasses case with an opening on one short side. Size 8x17 cm.
Soft glasses case with an opening on one short side. Size 8x17 cm.
Twill cap with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Twill cap with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Shirt in washed cotton denim with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Cargo jacket in a cotton weave with a hood that can be folded up and concealed in the stand-up collar with the help of a zip. Tab with a hook and loop fastening at the top and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with a tab and hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, flap chest and front pockets with a concealed press-stud, and a concealed drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.

Shirt jacket in a wool blend with a collar, covered button placket down the front and yoke at the back. Two chest pockets, two flap front pockets with a press-stud and long, viscose lined sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable, lace-covered shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable, lace-covered shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Set containing a pair of cufflinks and a tie pin in brushed metal. Size of cufflinks 1.7x1.7 cm, length of tie pin 6 cm.
Fleece-lined jacket in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar, detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Fleece-lined jacket in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar, detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif. Round neckline, short sleeves, and rounded and longer at the back.

Lightweight parka in a patterned weave with a detachable hood, zip with a chin guard and fake flap pockets at the front. Elastication around the hood, waist and at the cuffs. Lined.
Bikini briefs in soft modal jersey and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Straight-style shirt in a linen weave with a turn-down collar, French front, open chest pocket and gently tapered waist. Yoke at the back, short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Straight-style shirt in a linen weave with a turn-down collar, French front, open chest pocket and gently tapered waist. Yoke at the back, short sleeves and a rounded hem.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button, zip fly and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-up hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-up hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 45x225 cm.
Long-sleeved top in airy viscose jersey with a V-neck.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and racer back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, elasticated hem and opening at the back with crossover straps.

Long-sleeved, fitted body in lace with an opening and button at the back of the neck, a seam at the hips and press-studs at the crotch.
Jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with a hood and zip down the front. Front pockets, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside.

Jersey body with a gently draped V-neck, long sleeves, seam at the waist and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Trainers in leather with a short-pile faux fur covering and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Metal lapel pins with a decoration at the top. Length of pin approx. 8 cm.
Shirt in soft washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Set with a tie clip and lapel pin in metal. Length of tie clip 5.5 cm, length of lapel pin 8.5 cm.
Jacquard-knit jumper in cotton with a V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit Christmas jumper in soft cotton with a jacquard-knit motif and pompoms at the front. Buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves, and a frill-trimmed hem. Ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bracelet in antiqued metal with glass beads.

Fancy dress mask in moulded plastic with embroidered appliqués and sparkly stones on the front and silk ribbons at the back.
Metal fancy dress mask with a punched pattern and sparkly stones. Ties at the back.
Hat and tube scarf in double-layered cotton jersey.
Hat and tube scarf in double-layered cotton jersey.
Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Vertical chest pocket with a zip and taped detail, and discreet side pockets.
Satin nightslip with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a V-neck with a wide lace trim.
Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Washed denim shirt that ties at the hem. Collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and cap sleeves with embroidery.

Fancy dress costume in woven fabric with a print motif and a matching helmet. The costume has a stand-up collar with a padded edge, zip down the front and elasticated hems. The helmet has a hook and loop fastening at the front.
